content.home: An informational website and technology blog.
content.nfts: A collection of my works as NFTs
content.blog: A technology blog analyzing technology through various lenses, disciplines and views.
content.donate: Proceeds will be used to maintain and enhance the platform as well as for developing quality content for the blog.
content.contact: Contact me if you think I can help, or if you would like to contribute to the blog (including providing edits for errors), help develop the platform code, or have an idea you would like to share. Also, if you know a supported language and would like to help proofread or improve translations, I'll gladly accept such help!
content.about: I began my journey in software development when I was  13 years old. After almost two decades, technology has become a part of me. However, technology does not exist in a vacuum, and in order to understand technology one must understand its effects through history, on society, and the within the various disciplines it forever changes. It is this holistic and fundamental understanding that allows one to truly appreciate and understand the implications of technology upon humanity.
content.privacy_consent: By clicking “Accept All”, you consent to our website's use of cookies to provide you with the most relevant experience by remembering your preferences and repeat visits. However, you can select “Customize” to give controlled consent.
content.required_cookies: These cookies are considered mandatory for proper operation of the website. They cannot be disabled without rendering the platform unusable. These cookies are used to facilitate authentication when logged into the platform.
content.analytics_cookies: This site utilizes Google Analytics to provide analytical information for improving the quality of the platform through gathering usage data. You may disable these cookies although, allowing them will provide valuable data for us to improve. Cookies may change at discretion of Google.
content.performance_cookies: This site utilizes New Relic for performance monitoring and debugging. New Relic does not retain any personal data collected by the Browser Agent. Keeping this setting enabled will help us diagnose issues with the platform. Cookies may change at discretion of New Relic.
content.advertising_cookies: This site does not utilize third-party advertising services however, Google may add these cookies regardless. They can be safely disabled and are disabled by default.
content.disqus_cookies: Comments are powered using the Disqus platform. Disqus utilizes a number of cookies to power their functionality. Disabling these cookies will prevent you from using Disqus to comment. Cookies may change at discretion of Disqus.
content.disqus_disabled: Disqus is disabled. To participate in discussions, you will need to allow Disqus cookies.
